resources.string:
ॐ तत् सत्॥ Shall we update your Stardict dictionary files? (Details: dict-update-app ) 
 This program downloads latest dictionary files from the internet, and stores it in the SDCARD/dictdata folder, for Stardict apps to use. 
 (This is only a dictionary updater software. You NEED some Stardict-compatible dictionary utility (Eg: ebdic [Rated high], ColorDict, GoldenDict, GoldenDict paid …) separately.) 
 Please scroll + select the dictionary lists you want to use, then click the button.
We\'re done!! Get a stardict-compatible dictionary app (eg: Eg: ebdic [Rated high], Goldendict paid, ColorDict), if you don\'t already have one. Then reindex all your dictionaries.
